name: Falling frog
description:
if you get to 500 meters you are a epic gamer!

use A/D or LEFT/RIGHT to control

i made all art in this game (excluding the font, i think its called "montserrat extrabold" or something)

This game was made for the Cherry Soda game jam, in the Cherry Soda game jam we have a week to make a game, at the start of the jam we got the theme "Falling" we then had to make games that followed that theme, 3 days into the jam we got another theme that should also follow, that theme was "Rainbows"

this game was made in godot
